title: Missing arguments for the transient shell in fish
body:
## Bug Report

#### Current Behavior
When using `starship_transient_prompt_func` and `starship_transient_rprompt_func`, some required arguments are currently not passed. This means that some modules cannot be called in the functions, e.g. `cmd_duration` or `status` with the required value.

#### Expected Behavior
All required data is passed correctly to `starship_transient_prompt_func` and `starship_transient_rprompt_func` so that all modules can be used.

#### Additional context/Screenshots

Incorrect calls:
- [`starship_transient_prompt_func`](https://github.com/starship/starship/blob/master/src/init/starship.fish#L19) 
- [`starship_transient_rprompt_func`](https://github.com/starship/starship/blob/master/src/init/starship.fish#L43)

Possible related issues:
- #6028 

#### Possible Solution

Pass the arguments that where passed on [`starship prompt`](https://github.com/starship/starship/blob/master/src/init/starship.fish#L24C29-L24C208) also to [`starship_transient_prompt_func`](https://github.com/starship/starship/blob/master/src/init/starship.fish#L19) and [`starship_transient_rprompt_func`](https://github.com/starship/starship/blob/master/src/init/starship.fish#L43)

Changes in `starship.fish`:
```diff
if test "$TRANSIENT" = "1"
    set -g TRANSIENT 0
    # Clear from cursor to end of screen as `commandline -f repaint` does not do this
    # See https://github.com/fish-shell/fish-shell/issues/8418
    printf \e\[0J
    if type -q starship_transient_prompt_func
-        starship_transient_prompt_func
+        starship_transient_prompt_func --terminal-width="$COLUMNS" --status=$STARSHIP_CMD_STATUS --pipestatus="$STARSHIP_CMD_PIPESTATUS" --keymap=$STARSHIP_KEYMAP --cmd-duration=$STARSHIP_DURATION --jobs=$STARSHIP_JOBS
    else
        printf "\e[1;32m‚ùØ\e[0m "
    end
else
    ::STARSHIP:: prompt --terminal-width="$COLUMNS" --status=$STARSHIP_CMD_STATUS --pipestatus="$STARSHIP_CMD_PIPESTATUS" --keymap=$STARSHIP_KEYMAP --cmd-duration=$STARSHIP_DURATION --jobs=$STARSHIP_JOBS
end
```

Usage in `config.fish`:
```diff
function starship_transient_prompt_func
-    starship prompt
+    starship prompt $argv
end
```

#### Environment
- Starship version:
```
starship 1.20.1
branch:master
commit_hash:f505324
build_time:2024-07-27 09:09:51 +00:00
build_env:rustc 1.80.0 (051478957 2024-07-21),
```
- Shell type: `fish`
- Shell version: `fish, version 3.7.1`
- Shell plugin manager: `-`
- Terminal emulator: `-`
- Operating system: `-`

#### Relevant Shell Configuration

  Based on the shell you use, please paste the appropriate configuration.
  The default location for your shell is:

```fish
# config.fish
function starship_transient_prompt_func
    printf "transient-> "
    starship prompt $argv
end
    
function starship_transient_rprompt_func
    starship prompt --right $argv
    printf "¬†<-transient"
end

starship init fish | source
enable_transience
```
